questions.question: Universal Containers recently rolled out Einstein Generative Al capabilities and has created a custom prompt to summarize case records. Users have reported that the generated case summaries are not returning the appropriate information. What is a possible explanation for the poor prompt performance?
options: The Einstein Trust Layer is incorrectly configured.
The data being used for grounding is incorrect or incomplete.
The prompt template version is incompatible with the chosen large language model (LLM).
questions.explanation: Poor grounding data results in incomplete or incorrect summaries generated by the LLM.

questions.question: Universal Containers has created an Employee Agent. Which step should an Agentforce Specialist take to connect the agent with a Slack channel?
options: Create a connection between Salesforce and the Slack workspace.
Create an embedded service deployment and connection between Salesforce and the Slack workspace.
Create an Omni-Channel flow and connection between Salesforce and the Slack workspace.
questions.explanation: Connecting Salesforce with the Slack workspace enables the Employee Agent to operate within Slack.

questions.question: An Agentforce Specialist needs to enable the use of Sales Email prompt templates for the sales team. The Agentforce Specialist has already created the templates in Prompt Builder. According to best practices, which steps should the Agentforce Specialist take to ensure the sales team can use these templates?
options: Assign the Prompt Template User permission set and enable Sales Emails in Setup.
Assign the Data Cloud Admin permission set and enable Sales Emails in Setup.
Assign the Prompt Template Manager permission set and enable Sales Emails in Setup.
questions.explanation: Prompt Template User permission allows execution of templates, and Sales Emails must be enabled in Setup.

questions.question: What is the role of the large language model (LLM) in understanding intent and executing an agent action?
options: Identify the best matching topic and actions and the correct order of execution.
Find similar requested topics and provide the actions that need to be executed.
Determine a user's topic access and sort actions by priority to be executed.
questions.explanation: The LLM identifies intent, selects the appropriate topic and actions, and determines execution order.

questions.question: Universal Containers needs to create Data Cloud reports to understand agent behavior. Which data lake object (DLO) represents an overarching container capturing contiguous interactions with one or more Al agents?
options: AlAgentSession
AJAgentInteraction
AlAgentInteractionMessage
questions.explanation: AI Agent Session represents a full session grouping all interactions.

questions.question: Which scenario best illustrates the use of Model Context Protocol (MCP) in an enterprise Al deployment?
options: A sales agent discovering other agents' capabilities using Agent Cards
A legal assistant agent using MCP to dynamically find a document classification API to analyze case files
A customer service agent engaging another agent in real-time conversation to resolve tickets
questions.explanation: MCP enables dynamic discovery and use of external tools and APIs.

questions.question: What is an Agentforce Specialist able to do when the 'Enrich event logs with conversation data' setting in the Agentforce configuration is enabled?
options: Generate details reports on all agent conversations over any time period.
View the user click path that led to each agent action.
View session data including user input and agent responses for sessions.
questions.explanation: This setting enriches logs with conversation-level session data.

questions.question: Universal Containers (UC) has registered an external service and created a template-triggered prompt flow that invokes the external service to fetch data from a REST API. UC now needs to make the response data from the external service usable inside a prompt template as a merge field when the template runs. How should UC meet this requirement?
options: Use the 'Add Prompt Instructions' flow element.
Use External Service Record merge fields.
Convert the JSON to an XML merge field.
questions.explanation: External Service Record merge fields expose the response data to the prompt template.

questions.question: Universal Containers has PDF maintenance guides in an external folder, not yet in Salesforce. The team wants a standard, clicks- only setup for the Service Agent to use these documents. Which approach should the Agentforce Specialist implement?
options: Paste external PDF links into topic instructions and rely on the model to follow them, avoiding configuration of a retrieval source, index, or retriever action.
Upload the PDFs as File source in the Agentforce Data Library which will build a Search Index, and create a retriever to ground responses from those documents.
Configure Data Cloud to ingest file attachments and create custom index and retriever for product record and attachment dat
questions.explanation: Agentforce Data Library supports clicks-only setup with indexing and grounding.

questions.question: Coral Cloud Resorts is about to start testing its concierge agent with guests. Which metrics should be captured to monitor the performance, correctness, and user experienc–µ?
options: Agent performance, token usage, and conversation duration
Response performance, tone, and CSATS
Response times, accuracy and relevance of answers, and resolution success
questions.explanation: These metrics directly measure speed, correctness, and successful resolution.

questions.question: An Agentforce Specialist wants to troubleshoot an agent that is hallucinating weblinks. The agent has an action that uses a prompt template, which is using a knowledge retriever, to generate the output text that the agent will use. Which process is appropriate to find the root cause of the hallucination behavior?
options: Examine the prompt instructions and contents of the chunks shown in the resolved prompt output.
Examine the topic instructions and ensure the word "ALWAYS" is used in the hallucination guardrails.
Examine the topic name and classification description for hallucination guardrails.
questions.explanation: Resolved prompt output reveals grounding data and instructions causing hallucinations.

questions.question: An Agentforce Specialist needs to create a prompt template that extracts the customer's name, phone number, and case number from a block of text, and nothing else. How should the Agentforce Specialist structure the prompt to ensure the large language model (LLM) doesn't include extra conversation or text?
options: Ask the LLM to extract and only output the important information in the text.
Use well-defined output instructions and provide desired output examples.
Ensure in the prompt that the LLM has been told to only use name value pairs in the response.
questions.explanation: Clear output instructions with examples best control LLM output format.
